entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:22 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 2:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 10.1°C
Wind: S 23 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to freezing drizzle near midnight. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain except rain along parts of the coast. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
